query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Energy-aware Multi-entity Profile Taxonomy
result.description: Description of the methodology followed to produce the classification plus a report discussing the main findings. Thus, this report will describe in details an intelligent user multi-entity profiling and classification mechanism that encapsulates all factors related to the eco-behaviour of occupants in public buildings. If it is required, a final version of the description of the methodology will be included in the D6.3 and D6.4.

result.title: D1.5 Business Case Transport&Logistics@Sea
result.description: Work package specific business case assessing the business potential for various forms of transport and logistics solutions using an offshore transhipment hub.
